name: GB Bugs
description:
This was a rush job and quite the learning experience. I have not used C or GBDK before.  The goal was to make a simple Gameboy game for the 2021 GitHub Game Off. I think I sort of did that. 

It's "playable". Scores and the thing that shows how much fuel you have don't work yet.

https://github.com/49646a6974/GB-BUGS.git

Controls:

1) Move with the d-pad.

2) Press "A" to create a fire. You can create three before you have to refuel. All fuel containers respawn after you obtain a gem.

Gist:

1) Avoid the bugs.

2) Collect gems (fuel respawns on the map).

3) Use fire to kill bugs.

4) Quit and play something better.

To do:

1) Have scores displayed at the bottom of the screen.

2) Have icons at the bottom that shows how much fuel is left.
